body:
Comment 5: 
For this specific case there is no technical reason.
In general it's very hard to tell, when one function
mentions another, that some other initializer does not
then use that path to call it.  We've taken a very conservative
definition here (mention) because it is easy to understand,
if occasionally over-restrictive.  Writing a spec that was
both complete and still correct would have been many
more words, more than we wanted in the spec.  We can
always expand it later but for now that's what it is.

Russ
